__e: You are right, my son their souls will rest much better in consecrated ground.
And when I get to heaven, I won't damn your souls and ask god to send you frying' to hell for what you done to me.
OK, but on the question of killing, doing people a favour, saving their souls, killing them to save them...
The very minds of the people we are trying to save.
They are all great fighters... but I have looked into their souls... and yours.
Son we are here to pray for the souls of those men hanging outside.
Last night, when we fucked - made love, whatever- our souls joined together. Yeah?
We sold our souls, and we may never get anything in return.
If we cannot find our souls, we do not deserve our lives.
